<root><template><title>DISPLAYTITLE:isVehicleSensorEnabled</title></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> 1.72 </value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sensors </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns class name (to identify list based on component name) and info if given sensor is enabled </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''isVehicleSensorEnabled''' componentName </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2 </name>=<value> componentName : [[String]] - The component's name (can either be it is "real name" or it is className) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
______________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code> [[vehicle]] [[player]] [[isVehicleSensorEnabled]]  "PassiveRadarSensorComponent"; // [ ["PassiveRadarSensorComponent",true] ] </code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[listVehicleSensors]], [[enableVehicleSensor]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
